item.title: Season Tickets
item.text: Season tickets are now on sale! Reserve your seats for this fabulous season today. Call 974-5161 or download the order form.

item.title: New! Online ticket sales
item.text: You can now purchase tickets to 'Nora' online. Choose your seats!

item.title: Grad Student News
item.text: Workshops Galore! We're bringing in the best and the brightest for our best and brightest.
